Idk why, but this artist is top tier imo. Its very simple art and mediocre story but its just different from everyone else. Good stuff. Especially the Mating Press scenes.

Kiliu not only keeps NTR refreshing but does a good job of making fun of NTR itself and how ridiculous it is that the MC is always oblivious to his wife getting fucked right next to him.

Imo NTR doesn't have to be this falling out of love relationship study shit all the time.

Not only can that shit be depressing as fuck but it's the same angle every fucking time that ends in the MC seeing his wife get fucked by another dude through the keyhole of the bedroom or some shit.
she's obviously addicted to abortions.

The wife has gotten pregnant 5 times in 5 different chapters yet no baby and still recently married. The logic in their world where people fucking and naked in plain sight means they are invisible makes this version of ntr hilarious.
This series is funier than sexy or sad or anything that ntr is supposed to be.
